Name: House
About the game: HOUSE is a horror adventure game where you play as a young girl exploring a dangerous house that's doing everything it can to kill you and your family. Race against time to change fate...or fall into darkness yourself. FEATURES Explore a house that changes and reacts to your actions in real-time Race against time to save your family and yourself Multiple endings to discover Befriend or behead your family Experiment with the different items to try and survive Challenging, non-linear gameplay Uncover the dark secrets of a twisted family IT NEVER ENDS...
